title: Replace HEIFIX hero/branding images with more realistic visuals

requirements.summary: Add photorealistic hero and logo images as generated static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.edits output filenames.
The new images visually appear more realistic/photorealistic than the current ones (less illustrative/cartoon-like).

file_operations.description: Add the new photorealistic hero image asset (edited output): hero-repair-realistic.dim_1600x600.png.
Add the new realistic/professional logo image asset (edited output): repair-logo-realistic.dim_512x512.png (clean/transparent background as applicable).

requirements.summary: Update the header logo and Home hero image to use the new realistic generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx, the header logo uses the new realistic logo filename.
In frontend/src/App.tsx, the Home page hero uses the new realistic hero filename.
The Home page and header render without broken image links in the browser.

file_operations.description: Update image src references to point to the new generated filenames: replace /assets/generated/repair-logo.dim_512x512.png with /assets/generated/repair-logo-realistic.dim_512x512.png and replace /assets/generated/hero-repair.dim_1600x600.png with /assets/generated/hero-repair-realistic.dim_1600x600.png. Ensure no other UI or routing behavior changes and no edits occur under frontend/src/components/ui.
